title: Resolution and Property Drug and Gang Letters

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Resolution and property letters sent in accordance with the Chicago Drug and Gang, houses of prostitution and other disorderly houses ordinance (Sec 8-40-090) in Chicago's City Code for the following addresses: 

1310 S Christiana Ave
1451 N Avers Ave
2138 W 54 St
2631 E 74th Place
3083 S Lock St
3053 W Walnut St
4247 W Maypole Ave
4832-4858 S Vincennes Ave
4953 S Ashland Ave
5050 W Madison St
52 W 116 St
5743 S Ada St
6417 S Eberhart Ave
6754 East End Ave, also known as 1648 E 68 St
6829 S Bishop St
6917 S Talman Ave
6923 S Indiana Ave, also known as 208 E 69 Place

If letters are not available for all the properties above, please send what is available.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jenny Wadhwa
